div.p: Mean station accelerations in uplift for two overlapping 5-y time periods. ( A) Mean accelerations in the period that began in 2008.4, or when each GNET GPS station was established (if afterward), and ended in 2013.4. ( B) The mean accelerations in the time interval 2010.4â€“2015.4. ( C) Empirical cumulative distribution functions (CDFs) for the accelerations in each time period. U-Accel, vertical acceleration.
